message_1:
Consider the recurrence relation:

f(n) = f(n-1) + f(n-2) 

where f(1) = 1 and f(2) = 2. Find the value of f(6).
message_2:
To find the value of f(6), we can calculate the values of f(3), f(4), and f(5) using the given recurrence relation:

f(3) = f(2) + f(1) = 2 + 1 = 3
f(4) = f(3) + f(2) = 3 + 2 = 5
f(5) = f(4) + f(3) = 5 + 3 = 8
f(6) = f(5) + f(4) = 8 + 5 = 13

So, the value of f(6) is 13.
